cast.overview: The world’s top bodyguard gets a new client, a hitman who must testify at the International Court of Justice. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time.
cast.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard

crew.overview: The story of Elton John's life, from his years as a prodigy at the Royal Academy of Music through his influential and enduring musical partnership with Bernie Taupin.
crew.title: Rocketman

crew.overview: Armed with only one word - Tenet - and fighting for the survival of the entire world, the Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.
crew.title: Tenet

details.biography:
Since very early age Renars has been involved in sports and different performing arts. In sports he enjoyed the concept of discipline and hard work which would be rewarded by taking part and winning in competitions which gave him motivation to strive for better. Theater and dancing opened different kind of challenge and that is - how to deliver the best entertainment whether it's dancing, acting or public speaking.

He left Latvia in 2008 and moved to Canada. After 4 years there he moved to London. In 2015 he got qualified for British Stunt man register. Main focus is stunts, acting and TV presenting
details.name: Renars Latkovskis
